content: phaedra is a cropped comfortable sweater with a texture panel on the front and a dot motif on the rest of the body and sleeves with intuitive motifs and easy adjustements it s an easy to wear autumnal piece the pattern contains charted instructions and detailed instructions on how to maintain the motif and read your knitting as well as optional bust darts for the front the center panel is wider for the larger sizes with small sections of twisted ribbing spacing the different motifs **sizes ** 1 2 / 3 / 4 5 6 / 7 / 8 all measurements are those of the finished sweater see last pictures for schematic and complete measurements finished bust circ 97 110 / 120 / 132 143 154 / 166 / 177 cm 38 ¼ 43 ¼ / 47 ¼ / 52 56 ¼ 60 ¾ / 65 ¼ / 69 ¾ choose a size with about 20 cm 7 ¾ positive ease at bust shown in size 2 on a 88 cm 34 ¾ bust **yarn ** you will need 1100 1200 / 1300 / 1450 1600 1700 / 1800 / 1950 meters 1205 1315 / 1425 / 1585 1750 1860 / 1970 / 2135 yards of light fingering weight yarn and 1000 1100 / 1200 / 1350 1500 1600 / 1700 / 1850 meters 1095 1205 / 1315 / 1480 1640 1750 / 1860 / 2025 yards of lace weight yarn the sample is knit with knitting for olive merino in hazel and soft silk mohair in plum clay held together if substituting for a single strand of yarn you will need 1100 1200 / 1300 / 1450 1600 1700 / 1800 / 1950 meters 1205 1315 / 1425 / 1585 1750 1860 / 1970 / 2135 yards of sport to dk yarn **needles ** main fabric 3 75 mm us 5 circular needles with appropriate length to knit in the round and magic loop or dpns ribbing 3 5 mm us 4 circular needles with appropriate length to knit in the round and magic loop or dpns or size required to get gauge **gauge ** 21 5 sts x 30 rnds per 10 cm 4 with larger needles in dot motif after blocking **notions ** stitch markers tapestry needle and scissors scrap yarn to place sts on hold spare needle for three needle-bind-off cable needle optional row counter recommended **techniques used ** bottom up drop shoulder sweater split ribbed hem longer on the back all over dot motif on the body and sleeves texture panel on the center front featuring twisted stitches bobbles and small leaf motifs shoulders shaped with german short row and closed with a three needle bind-off picking up stitches straight sleeves with long ribbed cuffs optional german short-row bust darts based on cup size texture is
